author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch:
Follow up to r1850: get Belgian EID cards working on the test site:
- send that part of the chain 'connecting' the client certificate and a
certificate in the list provided by the server together with the client cert.
- handle (graceful) shutdown alerts from the server.
* buckets/sectrans_buckets.c
(translate_sectrans_status): Handle errSSLClosedGraceful and
errSSLClosedAbort. Log all errors.
(create_sectrans_certificate,
create_ssl_certificate): Reimplement existing create_sectrans_certificate in
two helper factory functions for both types of certificate wrappers.
(find_issuer_cert): Rename to ...
(find_issuer_cert_in_array): ... this. Update argument types. Use the new
helper factory functions.
(validate_server_certificate): Use the new helper factory functions. Use a
pool instead of an allocator.
(find_issuer_certificate_in_keychain): New function, searches for the cert
of an issuer of another cert in the keychains.
(find_intermediate_cas): New function, for a certificate, find all
intermediate certificates up to an anchor certificate.
(provide_client_certificate): When sending the client cert to the server,
include that part of the chain up to a certificate in the list
provided by (and thus trusted by) the server. Use the new helper factory
functions.
(decrypt_more_data): Secure Transport functions can return data even if an
error status is returned.

author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch:
Fix 2 crashes.
* buckets/sectrans_buckets.c
(sectrans_init_context): Don't use pool of allocator.
(validate_server_certificate): Initialize anchor_certrefs.

author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch:
Implement GUI mode for client certificates. Find a preferred identity for the
specified server, or allow the user to select identities from a list.
This also enables the use of smart cards on Mac OS X to authenticate a client.
* buckets/sectrans_buckets.c
(cfrelease_ref): Helper function to cleanup a CF object when a pool is
destroyed.
(sectrans_init_context): Use the parent pool to create the internal pools.
(select_identity): Shows panel to allow the user to select a client
indentity matching the server.
(provide_client_certificate): Add code to find and use a preferred identity
for the server, or find a list of identities to present to the user.

author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch:
Close file directly after reading its content, add comments, break long lines.
* buckets/sectrans_buckets.c
(load_data_from_file): Close file when its contents are read.

author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch:
Follow up to r1846.
* test/certificates.pem: New file, contains the certificates for test
test_sectrans_DER_decoding.
